function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Pattern of increased calls to domestic violence helpline since March 2020","Impact":"Higher risk of domestic violence due to increased calls","Mitigation":"Provide increased support for domestic violence victims, raise awareness, and improve access to social services","Technologies":"Crisis response hotlines, mobile apps for reporting domestic violence, online support forums","People":"Victims of domestic violence","Owner":"Government, NGOs, community organizations"},{"Description":"Limited availability of data by state for analysis","Impact":"Inability to conduct thorough analysis and account for all controls","Mitigation":"Advocate for improved data collection and reporting at the state level, explore alternative data sources","Technologies":"Data collection and reporting tools, data visualization software","People":"Researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Government, research institutions, data collection agencies"},{"Description":"Rise in calls to the helpline from all age groups, with larger effects in July","Impact":"Potential increase in domestic violence across all age groups, particularly in July","Mitigation":"Implement targeted interventions for different age groups, provide education and support for at-risk individuals","Technologies":"Educational campaigns, age-specific support programs, community outreach initiatives","People":"At-risk individuals of all age groups","Owner":"Community organizations, educational institutions, government"}]}
